page.title: 03THE LOCAL WEEKLY NEWSPAPER
page.content: Each {week}a newspaper called{' {The Darlington and Stockton Times }is published by {North of England {Newspapers,}Darlington which contains{ {news items}of interest to people living in{Leyburn}and the{surrounding {area.}The newspaper costs {18p.} In the edition on the 8th of June 1985 there was news from Leyburn about the {New Primary School}where the opening has been delayed.Also there are advertisements from shops like Berrys and there's advertisements about Leyburn Auction Mart. A long article explains why the North Yorkshire County Council have agreed to apply to the Government to have the main road (A684) upgraded as{Primary { trans-pennine}route.They say that money will be made available from government funds to improve the road for use by heavy goods vehicles.
